forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low around 5C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 43F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.

forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms likely. Low 38F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered thunderstorms in the morning, then mainly cloudy during the afternoon with thunderstorms likely. High 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered thunderstorms in the morning becoming more widespread in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 52F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.
